SELECT aa.* FROM ( SELECT l.inqbSeq, l.inqbType, l.inqbTitle, l.inqbContent, l.inqbCompleteNy, l.inqbRegDate, l.inqbEdiDate, l.inqbDelNy, l.inMember_inmeSeq, l.inStaff_instSeq, l.inQnaBoard_inqbSeq
ORDER BY (case when inQnaBoard_inqbSeq = 0 then inqbSeq else inQnaBoard_inqbSeq end), inqbRegDate ) aa limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}

SELECT l.inqbSeq, l.inqbType, l.inqbTitle, l.inqbContent, l.inqbCompleteNy, l.inqbRegDate, l.inqbEdiDate, l.inqbDelNy, l.inMember_inmeSeq, l.inStaff_instSeq, l.inQnaBoard_inqbSeq FROM mini.inqnaboard l WHERE 1=1 AND l.inqbSeq = #{inqbSeq}
